example.eg: Pour the plaster into the mold and let it set overnight.
example.egtrans: 将石膏倒入模具里，静置一夜。

example.eg: We found mould growing behind the toilet.
example.egtrans: 我们发现马桶后面都长霉菌了。

example.eg: Don't eat the bread if it has green mold on it.
example.egtrans: 如果面包上有绿霉，就不能吃了。

example.eg: He moulded the clay with his hands.
example.egtrans: 他用双手塑造粘土的形状。

example.eg: The children molded the clay into dinosaurs.
example.egtrans: 孩子们将粘土捏成恐龙的形状。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…塑造成, 将…捏成…形状

example.eg: It was his time at boarding school that moulded his character.
example.egtrans: 在寄宿学校的那段时光塑造了他的性格。

example.eg: Teachers are responsible for molding young minds.
example.egtrans: 教师肩负着塑造年轻一代思想的任务。

example.eg: His aunts moulded him into a perfect gentleman.
example.egtrans: 他的姑姑把他培养成了一位完美的绅士。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…塑造成, 把…培养成

dsense.name: break the mold (US), break the mould (UK)
fit the mold (US), fit the mould (UK)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 符合, 与...匹配, 相称
